name: Bype
description:
Description
Bype is a top-down shooter where you are... well... stuck in a loop! You steer a mechanical tower riding on a circular track and have to defend yourself against hordes of enemies. You also have a big grabbing-arm with which you can block projectiles and pick up enemies. As you defeat more waves you get up to three new weapons.

Enemies
There are four enemies you will encounter:

Acydr

Moves towards the player until in sufficient range and proceeds to charge a projectile to shoot the player with.

Acydr is a sensitive boi. He doesn’t like being around people and prefers a muddy swamp bath in his natural home: the primeval moors.

Voxyl

Moves towards the player and explodes.

The Voxyl species have met a terrible fate for centuries. A genetic mutation transformed the once free-spirited starfish into merciless explosives. Their grief afflicts those who feel safe. May you withdraw from their hugs.

Niflatur

Continuously spawns his minions to attack the player.

Who are the Niflature? What is a niflatur? Nobody knows! Rumor has it that it crawled out of a dark crevice and created the infamous Nifala Castle there. The rule of the Niflature is unchallenged and their territory is surrounded by an impenetrable mist. A real mystery!

Nifla

Niflaturs minions that walk towards the player and attack on contact.

The henchmen of the Niflature are just as incomprehensible as their creators. These restless creatures do not make a halt until they have fulfilled the most secret desires of their creators.

Controls
A, D - Move around the track

Mouse - Steer the grabbing-arm

Hold LMB - Grab with the grabbing arm

!IMPORTANT! if the screen size is incorrect (e.g. you can't see the whole screen) adjust it with the + and - keys.
